title: May 2023
cardTitle: Graduated New York University with a Masters

title: April 2022
cardTitle: Started Job at the Endless Frontier Labs
cardDetailedText: Contributed to the modernization of EFL's tech infrastructure and applications as a Software Engineer

title: Sept 2021
cardTitle: Started Graduate School at New York University

title: Aug 2021
cardTitle: Won 1st Place in NYU Tandon Made Challenge
cardSubtitle: Participated in a Startup Bootcamp with our team winning the challenge
cardDetailedText: Built an end to end platform for a Smart Recycling Bin using Python, Node.js and some Arduinos. Our MVC was able to detect trash and classify them to their appropriate bins, aimed at reducing unsorted waste ending up in the wrong place.

title: June 2021
cardTitle: Graduated Baruch College with Cum Laude Honors
cardSubtitle: Bachelor of Business Adminstration, Information Systems and Mathematics
cardDetailedText: Graduated with the Cecilia S Cohen Award, awared to an international student for their scholarship, leadership and community services

title: May 2020
cardTitle: Elected President of the International Student Organization
cardDetailedText: This is the year of the pandemic, and I led the organization of around 8 board members across multiple timezones. Advocated for international students to gather resources to navigate a virtual Baruch College. Organized engaging Zoom events to create a bridge between the international student community and the local domestic students, leading to an increase in 20+ members.

title: Feb 2020
cardTitle: Mentored at Tech Together Boston Hackathon
cardDetailedText: Contributed back to the developer community by mentoring the worlds largest women and non-binary hackathon participant community.

title: Oct 2019
cardTitle: Joined the International Student Organization at Baruch College
cardDetailedText: I was the Head of the Events Committee leading the famous Baruch Events such as the Arabian Nights, Thanksgiving Dinner and Halloween Carnival

title: 16 Jan 2018
cardSubtitle: Wrote my first lines of HTML code
cardDetailedText: Up until this point in my life, I was always intimidated by 'coding'. One day out of curiosity, after watching my peer build a website, I gave it a shot. Yes, these are the exact lines I wrote, and I saved it in my Notes. For the first time in my life, I felt like I could communicate with the world on a platform, the world wide web.
